word_group.brief_definition: 棕色调味料；精制棕色调味品
适用于甲者也适用于乙
word_group.phrase: what's sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander

word_group.brief_definition: 番茄酱；西红柿酱；蕃茄酱汁

bilingual.source: It was served cold and came with some sort of sticky sauce.
bilingual.target: 它是冷的，还配有某种粘稠的酱汁。

bilingual.source: The sauce will jell as it cools.
The sauce is simmering in the pan.
Stir the sauce until it has thickened.

bilingual.target: 这酱汁补充了鱼的味道。

bilingual.source: He poured the sauce over the pasta.
bilingual.target: 他把酱汁倒在意大利面上。

bilingual.source: She spilled sauce on her new dress.
bilingual.target: 她把酱汁洒在了新裙子上。

bilingual.source: He mashes the berries to make a sauce.
bilingual.target: 他把浆果捣碎做成酱汁。

list.abstract: Sauce，中文称沙司，已为大家熟悉和常用，是一种用蔬菜或水果加调味品制成的流质或半流质酱汁。沙司的种类和做法很多，有咸、酸、甜、辣等口味，主要分成冷沙司和热沙司两大类。 西餐菜式的变化，很多是使用了不同的沙司而引起。
《Sauce》是独立音乐人蔡诗芸演唱的歌曲，由 Flightsch 、Dominique Choy作词，Lewis Reuben Lawrence作曲，收录在蔡诗芸2018-04-18发行的专辑《Sauce》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Set all but two tablespoons of oil aside for the sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 留两汤匙油做酱汁用。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, this is still quite hot to handle but I'm going to cook or make the sauce actually first.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这还太烫了，但我要先调酱汁。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to serve up a little bit of the rice. Some of this delicious sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要盛一点炒饭出来，加上点儿美味的酱汁。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm going to use a great cheat's shortcut using tomato ketchup for the sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要使用经典速成方法，用蕃茄酱做酱汁。

yingyinNormal.en: The sauces are bubbling, in with a bit of light soy sauce, and some toasted sesame oil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 酱汁开始沸腾，加入一些生抽，还有芝麻油。

yingyinNormal.en: I want it a bit like the Japanese teriyaki, and it's got the sort of sticky glaze and the sticky sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要它像照烧一样，让酱汁变的粘稠鲜亮。

yingyinNormal.en: Add the tomato-ey sauce prepared earlier. Roughly chop some greens, spring onions and coriander.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入先前准备好的蕃茄酱汁，粗粗切一些葱和香菜。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just going to keep the marinade because we're gonna use that. It's gonna help us create the gorgeous sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚才的酱汁要留着，因为我们等下要用它来制作美味的调味酱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well I've got an audition down the street and I spilled sauce all over the front of my shirt. You got an extra one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要在街尾试镜，结果酱汁沾到衣服上了。你有多余的衬衫吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm serving this with a vibrant jammy relish of grilled sweet red peppers from a jar, sweet chilli sauce and squeezed lime, all roughly blended together and ready in seconds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蛋卷将搭配一种爽口的浓稠酱汁，一些灌装的烤红甜椒，加上甜辣酱，挤一点柠檬汁，再粗略地搅拌一下，酱汁就好了，马上就完成了。

yingyinNormal.en: Will you cut up hot dogs into little chunks and mix them in with the sauce? I don't have hot dogs. Oh, it's all right; I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能不能切点热狗丁加到酱汁里？我没有热狗。没关系，我有。

yingyinNormal.en: Make sure the delicious sauce just coats all the noodles and the crab, and then add in the coriander and the spring onions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 确保美味的酱汁包裹每一根的面条和螃蟹，然后加入香菜和葱。

yingyinNormal.en: I reluct meat. It's no meat, Reggie. Yes, but is this brown sauce vegetarian, Esa? Yes, I tell you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不喜欢吃肉。那不是肉，雷吉。但这个酱汁是棕色的，而我是素食主义者，埃萨。是的，我说是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, there is. Oh, here's a fun fact. Ketchup started out as a general term for sauce, typically made of mushrooms or fish brine with herbs and spices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是滴。有个好玩的事儿，起初，番茄酱是酱汁的总称，特别是那些加了草本植物和香料的蘑菇或腌鱼。

yingyinNormal.en: To go into the sauce I've got here some dry Chinese mushrooms. Really fragrant, it's going to impart a woody earthy aroma and just compliment all the other flavors in the meatballs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了做酱汁，我准备了干香菇，很香，它会带来木和泥土的香气，衬托肉丸中的其他味道。

yingyinNormal.en: Who was the shrimp with lobster sauce?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁点的鲜虾加龙虾酱？

yingyinNormal.en: Why didn't you get extra peanut sauce?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你为什么没多加花生酱呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Some light soy sauce, some groundnut oil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一些生抽，一些花生油。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the sauce? Is it meat based? No. Eat now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么酱，是肉酱吗？不是的，快吃吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, the humble tomato, the foundation of pizza sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，这小小的番茄，就是披萨酱的基础。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I'm just not a fan of <highlight>sauces</highlight>.
Locked in hot kitchens, Creme created his four "mother <highlight>sauces</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沉浸在炎热厨房里的 Creme 创造了四种“母亲调味料”。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>sauces</highlight>—béchamel, velouté, espagnole and allemande—formed the central building blocks for many French main courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些酱汁——贝夏梅尔乳沙司、白汁、棕酱和阿勒曼德沙司——构成了许多法国主菜的重要部分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A Chinese saying goes that “Firewood, rice, cooking oil, salt, <highlight>sauce</highlight>, vinegar and tea are the seven necessities to begin a day.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国有句谚语说：“柴、米、食用油、盐、酱、醋、茶，是一天开始的七大必需品。”

examination_example.sentence: Those ingredients each have their own chemicals and their own flavors, but now with your <highlight>sauce</highlight> you've made something different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些配料各有各的化学成分和风味，但是现在用你的调味汁，你做出了不同的东西。

examination_example.sentence: That tomato <highlight>sauce</highlight> you're making is made of tomatoes, onions, garlic, salt and pepper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你正在做的番茄酱是由西红柿、洋葱、大蒜、盐和胡椒制成的。
